Verifies the automatic logon password registry value (DefaultPassword) does not exist

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Store password using reversible encryption' is set to 'Disabled'

metadata.title: Anonymous Access to Named Pipes - Member Server
metadata.description: Named pipes that can be accessed anonymously must be configured to contain no values.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Network access: Named Pipes that can be accessed anonymously' is configured to contain no values

metadata.title: Remotely Accessible Registry Paths
metadata.description: Unauthorized registry paths must not be remotely accessible.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Network access: Remotely accessible registry paths' is configured with no entries
Verifies 'Network access: Remotely accessible registry paths' is configured to contain authorized registry paths
Verifies 'Network access: Remotely accessible registry paths' is not configured

metadata.description: Unauthorized shares must not be accessed anonymously.

Verifies 'Network access: Shares that can be accessed anonymously' is blank

metadata.title: Everyone Anonymous Rights
metadata.description: The system must not be configured to give anonymous users Everyone rights.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Network access: Let Everyone permissions apply to anonymous users' is set to 'Disabled'

metadata.title: TS/RDS - Session Limit
metadata.description: Remote Desktop Services must limit users to one remote session.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Restrict Remote Desktop Services users to a Single Remote Desktop Services Session' is set to 'Enabled'

metadata.title: Safe DLL Search Mode
metadata.description: The system must be configured to use Safe DLL Search Mode.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'MSS: (SafeDllSearchMode) Enable Safe DLL search mode (recommended)' is set to 'Enabled'

metadata.title: Audit Log Warning Level
metadata.description: The system must generate an audit event when the audit log reaches a percentage of full threshold.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'MSS: (WarningLevel) Percentage threshold for the security event log at which the system will generate a warning' is set to 90 percent or less

metadata.title: Disable IP Source Routing
metadata.description: The system must be configured to prevent IP source routing.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'MSS: (DisableIPSourceRouting) IP source routing protection level (protects against packet spoofing)' is set to 'Highest protection, source routing is completely disabled'

metadata.title: Disable ICMP Redirect
metadata.description: The system must be configured to prevent ICMP redirects from overriding OSPF generated routes.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'MSS: (EnableICMPRedirect) Allow ICMP redirects to override OSPF generated routes' is set to 'Disabled'

metadata.title: Disable Router Discovery
metadata.description: The system must be configured to disable the Internet Router Discovery Protocol (IRDP).

criterion.comment: Verifies 'MSS: (PerformRouterDiscovery) Allow IRDP to detect and configure Default Gateway addresses (could lead to DoS)' is set to 'Disabled'

metadata.title: TCP Connection Keep-Alive Time
metadata.description: The system must be configured to limit how often keep-alive packets are sent.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'MSS: (KeepAliveTime) How often keep-alive packets are sent in milliseconds' is set to '300000 or 5 minutes (recommended)' or less

metadata.title: Name-Release Attacks
metadata.description: The system must be configured to ignore NetBIOS name release requests except from WINS servers.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'MSS: (NoNameReleaseOnDemand) Allow computer to ignore NetBIOS name release requests except from WINS servers' is set to 'Enabled'

metadata.title: TCP Data Retransmissions
metadata.description: The system must limit how many times unacknowledged TCP data is retransmitted.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'MSS: (TcpMaxDataRetransmissions) How many times unacknowledged data is retransmitted (3 recommended, 5 is the default)' is set to 3 or less

metadata.title: Screen Saver Grace Period
metadata.description: The system must be configured to have password protection take effect within a limited time frame when the screen saver becomes active.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'MSS: (ScreenSaverGracePeriod) The time in seconds before the screen saver grace period expires (0 recommended)' is set to 5 or less

metadata.title: Remotely Accessible Registry Paths and Sub-Paths
metadata.description: Unauthorized remotely accessible registry paths and sub-paths must not be configured.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Network access: Remotely accessible registry paths and sub paths' is configured to contain authorized registry paths
Verifies 'Network access: Remotely accessible registry paths and sub paths' is not configured
Verifies 'Network access: Remotely accessible registry paths and sub paths' is configured but contains no entries

metadata.title: Optional Subsystems
metadata.description: Optional Subsystems must not be permitted to operate on the system.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'System Settings: Optional Subsystems' is blank

metadata.title: TS/RDS - Secure RPC Connection
metadata.description: The Remote Desktop Session Host must require secure RPC communications.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Require secure RPC communication' is set to 'Enabled'

metadata.title: Encrypting and Signing of Secure Channel Traffic
metadata.description: Outgoing secure channel traffic must be encrypted or signed.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Domain member: Digitally encrypt or sign secure channel data (always)' is set to 'Enabled'

metadata.title: Password Requirement
metadata.description: DoD information system access must require the use of a password.

criterion.comment: Tests if all user accounts require passwords (PA)
Tests if all user accounts require passwords (Other)

metadata.title: Password Requirement
metadata.description: DoD information system access must require the use of a password.

criterion.comment: Tests if all user accounts require passwords (PA)
Tests if all user accounts require passwords (Other)
Verifies 'MSS: (NoDefaultExempt) Configure IPSec exemptions for various types of network traffic' is set to 'Only ISAKMP is exempt (recommended for Windows Server 2003)'

metadata.title: UAC - Admin Elevation Prompt
metadata.description: User Account Control must, at a minimum, prompt administrators for consent on the secure desktop.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'User Account Control: Behavior of the elevation prompt for administrators in Admin Approval Mode' is set to 'Prompt for credentials on the secure desktop'
Verifies 'User Account Control: Behavior of the elevation prompt for administrators in Admin Approval Mode' is set to 'Prompt for consent on the secure desktop'
Verifies 'User Account Control: Behavior of the elevation prompt for administrators in Admin Approval Mode' is set to 'Prompt for credentials'
Verifies 'User Account Control: Behavior of the elevation prompt for administrators in Admin Approval Mode' is set to 'Prompt for consent'

metadata.title: UAC - User Elevation Prompt
metadata.description: User Account Control must automatically deny standard user requests for elevation.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'User Account Control: Behavior of the elevation prompt for standard users' is set to 'Automatically deny elevation requests'

metadata.title: IPv6 Transition
metadata.description: IPv6 must be disabled until a deliberate transition strategy has been implemented.

criterion.comment: Verifies IPv6 is disabled on all interfaces
Verifies IPv6 is disabled on all interfaces

metadata.title: Event Viewer Events.asp Links
metadata.description: Event Viewer Events.asp links must be turned off.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Turn off Event Viewer Events.asp' is set to 'Enabled'

metadata.title: WINER-000002
metadata.description: The system must be configured to generate error reports.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Disable Windows Error Reporting' is set to 'Disabled'

metadata.title: UAC - UIAccess Secure Desktop
metadata.description: UIAccess applications must not be allowed to prompt for elevation without using the secure desktop.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'User Account Control: Allow UIAccess applications to prompt for elevation without using the secure desktop' is set to 'Disabled'

metadata.title: TS/RDS - Clipboard Redirection
metadata.description: The system must be configured to prevent users from sharing clipboard content on their client computers with Remote Desktop Session Host that they access.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Do not allow clipboard redirection' is set to 'Enabled'

metadata.title: TS/RDS - COM Port Redirection
metadata.description: Users must be prevented from mapping local COM ports and redirecting data from the Remote Desktop Session Host to local COM ports.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Do not allow COM port redirection' is set to 'Enabled'

metadata.title: TS/RDS - LPT Port Redirection
metadata.description: Users must be prevented from mapping local LPT ports and redirecting data from the Remote Desktop Session Host to local LPT ports.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Do not allow LPT port redirection' is set to 'Enabled'

metadata.title: TS/RDS - PNP Device Redirection
metadata.description: Users must be prevented from redirecting Plug and Play devices to the Remote Desktop Session Host.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Do not allow supported Plug and Play device redirection' is set to 'Enabled'

metadata.title: TS/RDS - Smart Card Device Redirection
metadata.description: The system must be configured to ensure smart card devices can be redirected to the Remote Desktop session.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Do not allow smart card device redirection' is set to 'Disabled'

metadata.title: TS/RDS - Printer Redirection
metadata.description: The system must be configured to allow only the default client printer to be redirected in the Remote Desktop session.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Redirect only the default client printer' is set to 'Enabled'

metadata.title: TS/RDS - Remove Disconnect Option
metadata.description: The system must be configured to remove the Disconnect option from the Shut Down dialog box on the Remote Desktop Client.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Remove 'Disconnect' option from Shut Down dialog' is set to 'Enabled'

metadata.title: NTFS Requirement
metadata.description: Local volumes must be formatted using NTFS.

criterion.comment: Verifies local volumes are formatted using NTFS

metadata.title: Configure Automatic Updates
metadata.description: Automatic Updates must not be used (unless configured to point to a DoD server).

criterion.comment: Automatic updates are disabled

metadata.title: Device Install - PnP Interface Remote Access
metadata.description: Remote access to the Plug and Play interface must be disabled for device installation.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Allow remote access to the Plug and Play interface' is set to 'Disabled'

metadata.title: Device Install - Drivers System Restore Point
metadata.description: A system restore point must be created when a new device driver is installed.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Prevent creation of a system restore point during device activity that would normally prompt creation of a restore point' is set to 'Disabled'

metadata.title: Device Install - Generic Driver Error Report
metadata.description: An Error Report must not be sent when a generic device driver is installed.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Do not send a Windows error report when a generic driver is installed on a device' is set to 'Enabled'

metadata.title: Handwriting Recognition Error Reporting
metadata.description: Errors in handwriting recognition on Tablet PCs must not be reported to Microsoft.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Turn off handwriting recognition error reporting' is set to 'Enabled'

metadata.title: Power Mgmt - Password Wake on Battery
metadata.description: Users must be prompted for a password on resume from sleep on battery. Applicable to Server 2008 R2 if the system is configured to sleep.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Require a Password When a Computer Wakes (On Battery)' is set to 'Enabled'

metadata.title: Power Mgmt - Password Wake When Plugged In
metadata.description: Users must be prompted for a password on resume from sleep when plugged in. Applicable to Server 2008 R2 if the system is configured to sleep.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Require a Password When a Computer Wakes (Plugged In)' is set to 'Enabled'

metadata.title: Game Explorer Information Downloads
metadata.description: Game explorer information must not be downloaded from Windows Metadata Services.

criterion.comment: Verifies ''Turn off downloading of game information' is set to 'Enabled'

metadata.title: SPN Target Name Validation Level
metadata.description: The service principal name (SPN) target name validation level must be turned off.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Microsoft network server: Server SPN target name validation level' is set to 'Off'

metadata.title: Computer Identity Authentication for NTLM
metadata.description: Services using Local System that use negotiate when reverting to NTLM authentication must use the computer identity vs. authenticating anonymously.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Network Security: Allow Local System to use computer identity for NTLM' is set to 'Enabled'

metadata.title: NTLM NULL Session Fallback
metadata.description: NTLM must be prevented from falling back to a Null session.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Network security: Allow LocalSystem NULL session fallback' is set to 'Disabled'

metadata.title: PKU2U Online Identities Authentication
metadata.description: PKU2U authentication using online identities must be prevented.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Network Security: Allow PKU2U authentication requests to this computer to use online identities' is set to 'Disabled'

metadata.title: Kerberos Encryption Types
metadata.description: Kerberos encryption types must be configured to prevent the use of DES encryption suites.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Network Security: Configure encryption types allowed for Kerberos' is set to 'Enabled' with 'RC4_HMAC_MD5', 'AES128_HMAC_SHA1', 'AES256_HMAC_SHA1', 'Future encryption types'

metadata.title: IPv6 Source Routing
metadata.description: IPv6 source routing must be configured to the highest protection level.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'MSS: (DisableIPSourceRouting IPv6) IP source routing protection level (protects against packet spoofing)' is set to 'Highest protection, source routing is completely disabled'

metadata.title: IPv6 TCP Data Retransmissions
metadata.description: IPv6 TCP data retransmissions must be configured to prevent resources from becoming exhausted.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'MSS: (TcpMaxDataRetransmissions IPv6) How many times unacknowledged data is retransmitted (3 recommended, 5 is the default)' is set to 3 or less

metadata.title: Elevate when setting a networks location
metadata.description: Domain users must be required to elevate when setting a networks location.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Require domain users to elevate when setting a network's location' is set to 'Enabled'

metadata.title: Direct Access - Route Through Internal Network
metadata.description: All Direct Access traffic must be routed through the internal network.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Route all traffic through the internal network' is set to 'Enabled: Enabled State'

metadata.title: Windows Update Point and Print Driver Search
metadata.description: Windows Update must be prevented from searching for point and print drivers.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Extend Point and Print connection to search Windows Update' is set to 'Disabled'

metadata.title: Prevent device metadata retrieval from Internet
metadata.description: Device metadata retrieval from the Internet must be prevented.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Prevent device metadata retrieval from internet' is set to 'Enabled'

metadata.title: Prevent Windows Update for device driver search
metadata.description: Device driver searches using Windows Update must be prevented.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Specify search order for device driver source locations' is set to 'Enabled: Do not search Windows Update'

metadata.title: MSDT Interactive Communication
metadata.description: Microsoft Support Diagnostic Tool (MSDT) interactive communication with Microsoft must be prevented.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Microsoft Support Diagnostic Tool: Turn on MSDT interactive communication with Support Provider' is set to 'Disabled'

metadata.title: Windows Online Troubleshooting Service
metadata.description: Access to Windows Online Troubleshooting Service (WOTS) must be prevented.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Troubleshooting: Allow users to access online troubleshooting content on Microsoft servers from the Troubleshooting Control Panel (via Windows Online Troubleshooting Service - WOTS)' is set to 'Disabled'

metadata.title: Disable PerfTrack
metadata.description: Responsiveness events must be prevented from being aggregated and sent to Microsoft.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Enable/Disable PerfTrack' is set to 'Disabled'

metadata.title: Application Compatibility Program Inventory
metadata.description: The Application Compatibility Program Inventory must be prevented from collecting data and sending the information to Microsoft.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Turn off Program Inventory' is set to 'Enabled'

metadata.title: Autoplay for non-volume devices
metadata.description: Autoplay must be turned off for non-volume devices.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Turn off Autoplay for non-volume devices' is set to 'Enabled'

metadata.title: Turn Off Game Updates
metadata.description: Downloading of game update information must be turned off.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Turn off game updates' is set to 'Enabled'

metadata.title: Prevent Joining Homegroup
metadata.description: The system must be prevented from joining a homegroup.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Prevent the computer from joining a homegroup' is set to 'Enabled'

metadata.title: Windows Anytime Upgrade
metadata.description: Windows Anytime Upgrade must be disabled.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Prevent Windows Anytime Upgrade from running' is set to 'Enabled'

metadata.title: Explorer Data Execution Prevention
metadata.description: Explorer Data Execution Prevention must be enabled.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Turn off Data Execution Prevention for Explorer' is set to 'Disabled'

metadata.title: Default Autorun Behavior
metadata.description: The default autorun behavior must be configured to prevent autorun commands.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Default behavior for AutoRun' is set to 'Enabled:Do not execute any autorun commands'

metadata.title: Task Scheduling - Server Operators
metadata.description: The Server Operators group must have the ability to schedule jobs by means of the AT command disabled.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Domain Controller: Allow server operators to schedule tasks' is set to 'Disabled'

metadata.title: Kerberos - User Logon Restrictions
metadata.description: Kerberos user logon restrictions must be enforced.

criterion.comment: Kerberos Policy - Enforce user logon restrictions - Enabled, PA test = -1
Kerberos Policy - Enforce user logon restrictions - Enabled, Other tools test = 1

metadata.title: Kerberos - Service Ticket Lifetime
